CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8)
PROJECT(NFLuaBind)

AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./ SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./lpeg SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./lua SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./lua-fmt SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./lua_protobuf SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./luacjson SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./luafilesystem SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./luaintf SRC)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./protoc-gen-lua SRC)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Release")
	SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH "${CMAKE_NFSHM_SOURCE_DIR}/Build/Lib/Release")
	ADD_LIBRARY( ${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${SRC} )
elseif(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "Debug")
	SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH "${CMAKE_NFSHM_SOURCE_DIR}/Build/Lib/Debug")
	ADD_LIBRARY( ${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${SRC} )
elseif (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "DynamicRelease")
	SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH "${CMAKE_NFSHM_SOURCE_DIR}/Build/Lib/Release")
	ADD_LIBRARY( ${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${SRC} )
elseif(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE STREQUAL "DynamicDebug")
	SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH "${CMAKE_NFSHM_SOURCE_DIR}/Build/Lib/Debug")
	ADD_LIBRARY( ${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${SRC} )
endif()
